article_metadata.news-keywords: John Kasich, Myrtle Beach, constitution, attorney general, alan wilson, supreme court, SCOTUS, rule of law, south carolina, presidential primary, GOP, Republican, donald trump
article_metadata.description: Donald Trump’s demand that all Muslims be banned from entering the U.S. because of recent terrorist attacks in California and Paris will break his support among the Republican party faithful, GOP presidential hopeful John Kasich said Tuesday.
article_metadata.title: Kasich: Proposed Muslim ban dooms Trump’s presidential aspirations | The Sun News

og.description: Donald Trump’s demand that all Muslims be banned from entering the U.S. because of recent terrorist attacks in California and Paris will break his support among the Republican party faithful, GOP presidential hopeful John Kasich said Tuesday.
